patthana16.40:1.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañcatiṁsa, ārammaṇe chabbīsa …pe… avigate pañcatiṁsa.
patthana16.40:2.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā chabbīsa …pe… avigate chabbīsa.
